## Description The image is a logo featuring the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal bar that spans the width of the logo. The design is simple and uses high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition. ## K 3 CLASSIC Der K 3 Classic mit Teleskopgriff überzeugt besonders bei leichteren Verschmutzungen rund ums Haus. Dabei ist er zudem besonders kompakt, leicht zu transportieren und gut zu verstauen. ## Key-Value Pair Bestell-Nr.: 1.676-220.0 - Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung - Sehr kompaktes, leicht zu transportierendes und einfach zu verstauendes Reinigungsgerät - Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529041364
Stromart V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 120 / 2 - max. 12
Fördermenge l/h 380
Flächenleistung m²/h 25
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1,6
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 4,2
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 5,9
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 264 × 256 × 450
### Ausstattung
Ausstattung
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [ ]
HD-Schlauch m 6
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugschlauch
Teleskopgriff [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
## Description The image shows a yellow pressure washer with several components. The main unit is upright with two large wheels for mobility. It has a hose neatly coiled around the front, and a handle on top for easy transport. The brand name is visible on the top front of the unit. In front of the main unit, there are three detachable components: 1. **Spray Gun**: A black handheld spray gun with a trigger, designed to connect to the hose for directing water flow. 2. **Two Spray Lances**: - The first lance has a simple nozzle for general cleaning tasks. - The second lance features a more specialized nozzle, likely for more focused or powerful cleaning. The design suggests a compact and portable pressure washer suitable for home use, such as cleaning cars, driveways, or patios. The bright yellow color is distinctive and likely intended for easy visibility. ## Figure Description The image is a stylized graphic with a large number "1" in the background. Overlaid on the number is a yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the text reads: **WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE GRAPHICS BRAND** This suggests a claim of being the top brand in the freelance graphics industry. The design uses bold, capitalized text to emphasize the message, with the yellow color likely intended to attract attention. ## Description The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag, which are black, red, and yellow, arranged in a stylized, angular design. Below the flag design, the text "Made in Germany" is prominently displayed. The flag colors are arranged horizontally, with black on top, red in the middle, and yellow at the bottom. The design suggests a sense of movement or direction, possibly indicating quality or precision associated with German manufacturing. The text is in a simple, bold font, emphasizing the origin of the product. ## Description The image is a symbol or icon with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized representation of a power plug and socket. The plug is depicted as a cylindrical shape with a lightning bolt symbol above it, indicating electricity or power. The socket is represented as a rectangular shape with an opening for the plug. Below the graphic, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. This suggests an emphasis on increased or full power capacity. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast colors to convey the message effectively. ## Description The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle with an adjustable power setting. The nozzle is shown spraying water, and there is a plus sign (+) indicating an increase in power. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, which suggests a focus on visibility and caution. The icon likely represents a feature on a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power of the water spray. ## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with a blue and white color scheme. The top part of the emblem reads "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" in white uppercase letters on a blue background. Below this, there is a stylized trophy icon in the center, which is also white. Underneath the circular emblem, there is a rectangular section with a gold background. This section contains the text "RECORD HOLDER" in uppercase letters, written in white. The overall design signifies an official recognition by Guinness World Records, indicating that the holder has achieved a world record. I'm unable to provide a detailed description of the image as it is too blurred to extract any meaningful information. If you have a clearer version or additional context, please share it for further assistance.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal bar that spans the width of the logo. The design is simple and uses high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition.

## K 3 CLASSIC

Der K 3 Classic mit Teleskopgriff überzeugt besonders bei leichteren Verschmutzungen rund ums Haus. Dabei ist er zudem besonders kompakt, leicht zu transportieren und gut zu verstauen.

- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung
- Sehr kompaktes, leicht zu transportierendes und einfach zu verstauendes Reinigungsgerät
- Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529041364
Stromart V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 120 / 2 - max. 12
Fördermenge l/h 380
Flächenleistung m²/h 25
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1,6
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb

Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 5,9
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 264 × 256 × 450

### Ausstattung

## Description

The image shows a yellow pressure washer with several components. The main unit is upright with two large wheels for mobility. It has a hose neatly coiled around the front, and a handle on top for easy transport. The brand name is visible on the top front of the unit.

In front of the main unit, there are three detachable components:

1. **Spray Gun**: A black handheld spray gun with a trigger, designed to connect to the hose for directing water flow.

2. **Two Spray Lances**: 
   - The first lance has a simple nozzle for general cleaning tasks.
   - The second lance features a more specialized nozzle, likely for more focused or powerful cleaning.

The design suggests a compact and portable pressure washer suitable for home use, such as cleaning cars, driveways, or patios. The bright yellow color is distinctive and likely intended for easy visibility.

## Figure Description

The image is a stylized graphic with a large number "1" in the background. Overlaid on the number is a yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the text reads:

**WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE GRAPHICS BRAND**

This suggests a claim of being the top brand in the freelance graphics industry. The design uses bold, capitalized text to emphasize the message, with the yellow color likely intended to attract attention.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag, which are black, red, and yellow, arranged in a stylized, angular design. Below the flag design, the text "Made in Germany" is prominently displayed. The flag colors are arranged horizontally, with black on top, red in the middle, and yellow at the bottom. The design suggests a sense of movement or direction, possibly indicating quality or precision associated with German manufacturing. The text is in a simple, bold font, emphasizing the origin of the product.

## Description

The image is a symbol or icon with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized representation of a power plug and socket. The plug is depicted as a cylindrical shape with a lightning bolt symbol above it, indicating electricity or power. The socket is represented as a rectangular shape with an opening for the plug.

Below the graphic, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. This suggests an emphasis on increased or full power capacity. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast colors to convey the message effectively.

## Description

The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle with an adjustable power setting. The nozzle is shown spraying water, and there is a plus sign (+) indicating an increase in power. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, which suggests a focus on visibility and caution. The icon likely represents a feature on a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power of the water spray.

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with a blue and white color scheme. The top part of the emblem reads "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" in white uppercase letters on a blue background. Below this, there is a stylized trophy icon in the center, which is also white.

Underneath the circular emblem, there is a rectangular section with a gold background. This section contains the text "RECORD HOLDER" in uppercase letters, written in white.

The overall design signifies an official recognition by Guinness World Records, indicating that the holder has achieved a world record.
